next_steps.note: "Define garden goals: Determine what will be grown (vegetables, flowers, herbs, etc.) and desired yield/size of garden.",
"Assess garden space & sunlight: Evaluate potential garden locations, measuring available space and noting sunlight exposure throughout the day.",
"Research plant choices: Based on goals & space, research suitable plants for the local climate & growing conditions.",
"Create a basic garden plan/layout: Sketch a rough layout of the garden, considering plant spacing, sun exposure, and access.",
"Source initial supplies:  Begin compiling a list of necessary supplies (seeds/seedlings, soil, tools) and estimate costs."
